thread.title: Saundra thompson
thread.title_full: The 3 Week Diet reviewed by Saundra thompson

author: Saundra thompson
title: Saundra thompson
text: I have had a hard time being motivated to stay on a diet. I have dieted so much on and off in my life that I just felt dread and discouragement because I knew it would take so long to make any progress. My weight normally comes off excruciatingly slow. When I read about the science behind the 3 week diet I was interested in trying it and hopeful that it might work. I made up my mind to follow it completely, as it was only for three weeks. I lost 13.4 pounds in my three weeks. My pants fit again and I discovered I truly felt better when I was eating less and fasting intermittently. I took a week off and now I'm ready to go a second round. I'm thankful I have a plan to use that I know will work. This diet was very effective in my experience.
